## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G19290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G19290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABF4, AREB2, AtAREB2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ABRE binding factor 4, ABA-RESPONSIVE ELEMENT BINDING PROTEIN 2
- **Description:**   ABRE binding factor 4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090599
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
